TITLE: 'I can't win in this market': Why LGBTQ homebuyers say mortgage rates are hitting them especially hard
SUMMARY: The rapid rise in home prices, followed by a spike in mortgage rates, is particularly impactful for LGBTQ homebuyers.

TITLE: 43% of homeowners have delayed home improvements and maintenance due to inflation. Here's why that's risky
SUMMARY: If inflation is squeezing your budget, there are steps you can take as a homeowner to help avoid costly fixes.

TITLE: China's property troubles have pushed one debt indicator above levels seen in the financial crisis
SUMMARY: A measure of risk levels for Asia debt surpassed its 2009 financial crisis high, thanks to a surge in downgrades of Chinese property developers, Moody's said.

TITLE: Millennial millionaires are delaying home, car purchases due to inflation
SUMMARY: Nearly half of millennial millionaires say higher borrowing costs are causing them to delay buying a car, and 44% say higher interest rates have caused them to delay purchasing a home.

TITLE: Here's what the Federal Reserve's 0.75 percentage point rate hike — the highest in 28 years — means for you
SUMMARY: The Fed announced its highest rate hike in 28 years to fight inflation. Here's how that impacts your credit card, mortgage, car loan, student debt and savings.

TITLE: Homebuilder sentiment drops to lowest level in two years as housing demand slows
SUMMARY: Builder sentiment is getting hit by higher interest rates, which are causing a slowdown in housing demand.

TITLE: Mortgage demand is now roughly half of what it was a year ago, as interest rates move even higher
SUMMARY: Sharply rising interest rates are decimating refinance volume, and those rates, along with sky-high home prices, are hitting demand from buyers.

TITLE: 30-year mortgage rate surges to 6.28%, up from 5.5% just a week ago
SUMMARY: The average rate on the popular 30-year fixed mortgage hit 6.28% Tuesday, according to Mortgage News Daily.

TITLE: Real estate firms Compass and Redfin announce layoffs as housing market slows
SUMMARY: In filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Compass announced a 10% cut to its workforce, and Redfin announced an 8% cut.

TITLE: Federal Reserve could boost rates by 75 basis points this week: 3 money moves to make first
SUMMARY: After May's disappointing consumer price index report, some analysts are now expecting a 75 basis point hike from the Fed on Wednesday. Here's how to prepare.

TITLE: The California exodus continues as residents head south of the border
SUMMARY: Californians are increasingly making the move to Mexico to escape rising housing prices, traffic and expensive healthcare.

TITLE: Big landlords jump into the homebuilding business as demand for single-family rentals surges
SUMMARY: Big publicly traded landlords are fast becoming homebuilders, as the supply of homes for rent drops and demand surges.

TITLE: Here’s how to fight a higher-than-expected property tax bill
SUMMARY: If the value of your home ballooned during the Covid pandemic, there may be ways to fight a higher-than-expected property tax bill, according to experts.

TITLE: Trump and his kids, Don Jr. and Ivanka, set to testify in New York attorney general investigation starting July 15
SUMMARY: New York Attorney General Letitia James is investigating the Trump Organization for its valuation of real estate. Donald Trump calls the probe a witch hunt.

TITLE: Mortgage demand falls to the lowest level in 22 years amid rising rates and slowing home sales
SUMMARY: Mortgage demand continues to fall as interest rates rise further and affordability in the housing market weakens.

TITLE: 'Yellowstone' boom pits lifetime Montana residents against wealthy newcomers
SUMMARY: "Yellowstone," which is partially filmed in Montana, has become one of the hottest shows on TV, and it's raised the profile of Big Sky Country.

TITLE: Housing wealth gains a record $1.2 trillion, but there are signs the market is cooling
SUMMARY: Two years of rapidly rising home prices have pushed the nation's collective home equity to new highs.

TITLE: Considering an adjustable rate mortgage? Be sure you fully understand the risks
SUMMARY: While a so-called ARM can be a good fit for some homebuyers, it's worth assessing whether the risks would make sense for your situation.

TITLE: Mortgage rates rise sharply after three weeks of easing
SUMMARY: Mortgage rates are surging higher again this week after falling for the past three weeks.

TITLE: Mortgage demand falls to the lowest level since the end of 2018, even as interest rates ease a bit
SUMMARY: Applications for a mortgage to purchase a home fell 1% last week compared with the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association.

TITLE: Home prices surged over 20% in March as interest rates also rose, according to S&P Case-Shiller
SUMMARY: Home prices continued to increase their gains, despite slower sales and higher mortgage rates.

TITLE: Here's what you need to know about reverse mortgages
SUMMARY: With markets volatile and housing hot, reverse mortgages are attractive to retirees looking for cash while staying in their homes.

TITLE: The Hamptons summer rental market is facing an unexpected chill as inventory piles up and prices come down
SUMMARY: After two years of strong demand and soaring prices, the supply of rentals in the Hamptons is surging, leading to a wave of last-minute price cuts.

TITLE: House hunting? Here's when to increase your budget and when to stick to your original price
SUMMARY: In February, the median sales price for homes in the U.S. was $357,300, a 15% increase on the year, according to the National Association of Realtors.

TITLE: There's a 'massive gap' between housing demand and supply in Singapore, PropertyGuru CEO says
SUMMARY: Demand has been on a tear and supply has been constrained, said Hari Krishnan, CEO of PropertyGuru.

TITLE: Judge dismisses Trump federal lawsuit against New York Attorney General Letitia James over her probe of business
SUMMARY: Ex-President Donald Trump and his company are being investigated by New York Attorney General Letitia James over valuations of real estate assets.

TITLE: The Fed will raise interest rates again soon. Make these money moves now
SUMMARY: "If your New Year's resolution was to build a household budget, it may need a refresh and a review," said certified financial planner Cathy Schaeffer.

TITLE: Mansions in Boca Raton are commanding Miami Beach prices. Here's a look inside
SUMMARY: Ultra-high-end real estate in Boca Raton, Florida, is on a stratospheric rise, breaking record sale prices every year for five consecutive years.

TITLE: Home prices have surged. Here's how to tap into that equity if you aren't ready to sell
SUMMARY: Total housing wealth grew by $8.2 trillion between 2010 and 2020, according to a March report from the National Association of Realtors.

TITLE: Home listings suddenly jump as sellers worry they may miss out on the red-hot housing market
SUMMARY: With home sales slowing and mortgage rates rising, home sellers are starting to worry that the red-hot housing market is over.
